data.what_is: Corefactors is a RevOps-enabling end-to-end CRM platform. The platform aims to cater to the growing need for a unified platform to manage customer relations and customer-facing teams. With the proliferation of customer touchpoints, intensifying competition, and ever-heightening customer expectations, Corefactors CRM enables the RevOps ecosystem and reduces revenue leakages by aligning them and creating a 3600 view of customer and business.
data.product_description: Corefactors is a RevOps-enabling end-to-end CRM solution designed to facilitate small-scale to medium-scale organizations. Businesses can manage entire revenue generation from sales to marketing (both offline and online) to customer support from one centralized platform. The advanced workflow automation, inbuilt nudges and triggers, 3600 customer view, centralized data repository, and open integration enable businesses to break silos between teams and align them to work towards one common goal of revenue optimization. Key features include customer contact management, journey automation, and multichannel communication capabilities including inbuilt telephony with auto dialler and click-to-call ability, Email, SMS, and WhatsApp. It provides sales force automation including lead scoring, task and activity management, alerts and reminders, a mobile app with tracking capability for field team, list management for customer segmentation and targeting, content management for personalized campaigns, a ticketing system to handle customer queries, and rich analytics with quick dashboards on sales performance, sales, pipeline, call reports, marketing campaign reports, tickets, productivity, and more.

plan_features: Contact Management (Lead Storage) Up to 25k Contacts
SMS and Email as Communication Channels for Follow-up with Leads
Contact Management (Lead Storage) Up to 50k Contacts
SMS, Email, Call and WhatsApp as Communication Channels for Follow-up with Leads
Auto Replies to Leads/Contacts using Email and SMS
Customer support and success Ticket Creation (Manually - Calls, and Emails)
Access Lead and Customer Details with mobile app
Update Lead and Customer Details with mobile app
Communicate with Leads and Customers with mobile app
Contact Management (Lead Storage) Up to 100k Contacts
SMS, Email, Call and WhatsApp as Communication Channels for Follow-up with Leads
Auto Replies to Leads/Contacts using Email and SMS
Instant Auto Call Connection with Leads
Customer support and success Ticket Creation (Manually - Calls, Emails and API's)
SLA Management (SLA Timing and Group Configruation)
Ticket Routing	(Smart Routing with Auto Call Connection)
Access Lead and Customer Details with mobile app
Update Lead and Customer Details with mobile app
Communicate with Leads and Customers with mobile app

initial_reviews.review_title: Best marketing automation software used to excel the business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Corefactors?
All of the features are awesome few of them were out of the chart. Features like email marketing, SMS marketing, marketing automation. Marketing analysis is very insightful and provides important information about the customer so that we can target the potential customer. Social media marketing, CRM integration was seamless and easy to use.

What do you dislike about Corefactors?
Integration with different platforms is a bit of a problem. But the overall product is awesome.

Recommendations to others considering Corefactors:
As far as the recommendation is a concern I will highly recommend this product as it full filled my requirement and help in increasing my efficiency and productivity. This product also helps in saving a lot of time which I can use for other stuff.

What problems is Corefactors solving and how is that benefiting you?
Data analysis of different platforms for marketing strategies. Email and SMS marketing. Lead analysis and generation so that we can target potential customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the best Marketing platform I have came across
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Corefactors?
All multichannel marketing in one platform. You don't need to go anywhere you will find all at one place at an affordable price.

What do you dislike about Corefactors?
Sometimes I am getting a delay in the reports when I am dealing with bulk data like more than lakhs number, But its fine, I liked it and these delays are quite normal.

What problems is Corefactors solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am managing all my Marketting Campaigns and Maintaing the Leads here.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Corefactors?
The best multichannel marketing platform for all your marketing campaigns and you can manage your leads as well.

What do you dislike about Corefactors?
Sometimes we have wait more to get the reports. but, not all the time!

Recommendations to others considering Corefactors:
If you are a SME and in need of promote your Organisation in the market then TELEDUCE would be best option i suggest. Go for it and make your marketing much easier than you ever think.

What problems is Corefactors solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's kinda all in one platform. you can do all the marketing campaigns and manage your leads as well. Bulk-SMS is the most important feature i am enjoying.
